name: innovate

to introduce changes and new ideas: The fashion industry is always desperate to innovate. innovator noun [ C ] us/ˈɪn·əˌveɪ·t̬ər/
A fearless innovator, Ives liked to play music simultaneously in different meters and keys.
Add to word list
Add to word list
to develop a new design, product, idea, etc.: The market leader's proven ability to innovate provides a key attraction for shareholders.
